definition: (football) a kick in which the football is dropped from the hands and kicked before it touches the ground, place a bet on
details:
noun
- (football) a kick in which the football is dropped from the hands and kicked before it touches the ground
= example: (football) a kick in which the football is dropped from the hands and kicked before it touches the ground
= synonyms: punting
- an open flat-bottomed boat used in shallow waters and propelled by a long pole
- formerly the basic unit of money in Ireland
= synonyms: pound
verb
- place a bet on
= synonyms: back, game, stake, bet on
- propel with a pole
= synonyms: pole
- kick the ball
